title: Sampler, 1701–02
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: knots, chain, eyelet and loop stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 105 x 85 cm (41 5/16 x 33 7/16 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Six cross borders, geometrical patterns in embroidery; initials "YDK" crowned "ANNO 17012"; edged with small knots.
